resources.string: "Ko ha Xposed module ʻoku ne liliu ʻa e ngaahi fakamatala kotoa ʻi he app ki ha lea fakafonua kehe"

"AllTrans-liliu kakato e Apps Hange ko hono liliu ʻo e webpages, ka ki he polokalama Android. Ko e ha ʻoku AllTrans ʻoku ne fetongi ʻa e fakamatala kotoa pe ʻi ha app ʻi ha lea fakafonua mei he lea fakafonua ʻe taha ʻi he runtime. Lea ʻaki ʻa e polokalama ko e app ʻoku ke fie fakaʻaongaʻi, ʻoku ʻi Siamane, ka ʻoku ke ʻiloʻi pe ʻa e lea faka-Pilitania. Pea ʻi he taimi pe te ke fakaava ai ʻa e app ʻoku fiemaʻu, ʻe fetongi kotoa ʻa e ngaahi fakamatala ʻi he app, ʻi ha feituʻupe, pea ʻe fakafetongi ia ʻe he lea faka-Pilitania ʻi onopooni. ʻoku tatau ʻeni mo e founga ngaue ʻa e liliu lea ʻi he browsers. Fie ? Xposed e palani pe VirtualXposed pe taichi fola pea lele. Kapau ʻoku ʻi ai Haʻo BootLoader kuo loka pe ko ha telefoni ʻoku ʻikai makatuʻunga Te ke lava ʻo download ʻa e taichi (a xposed emulator) mei he https://github.com/taichi-framework/TaiChi/releases/ Pe te ke lava ʻo download ʻa e VirtualXposed (ko ha xposed emulator hange ko e feituʻu ʻoku faitatau ai, Apps ʻe ua) mei he https://github.com/android-hacker/VirtualXposed/releases Kapau ʻoku ʻikai ke ke ʻilo ʻa e Meʻa Xposed pe Virtualxposed, mahalo ʻoku ʻikai ko e app ʻeni ia kiate koe ʻi hono fakaʻaongaʻi e AllTrans ? Fakapapauʻi ʻoku fakamoʻui ʻa e AllTrans ʻi XposedInstaller/taichi. ? ʻi he konga ki he settings fakamamani lahi, fili e liliu mei he lea fakafonua mo e lea liliu ki he lea fakafonua. ? ʻi he Apps ke liliu e peesi, kumi e polokalama ʻoku ke loto ke liliu, lomiʻi ʻi he puha ke fakaʻilongaʻi hoko ki ai. ? Tapuni pea toe tamateʻi e app ʻoku ke fie liliu-ʻoku totonu ke liliu ia!"
